entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Kawartha Lakes (Fenelon Falls)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:47 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 09:54 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

Temperature: 0.3°C
Pressure: 97.9 kPa
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 0.3°C

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 this evening. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
